name: Super Spy
description: Find the missile before time runs out in this 1982 text adventure for C64 and Spectrum.

name: Revolution Under Siege
description: A turn-based historical wargame that allows you to play as one of the factions during the Russian Civil War.

name: Alf in the Color Caves
description: In this colorful and engaging game, guide ALF through the vibrant Color Caves using your joystick. Navigate diverse challenges, including squeezing through tight spaces and zigzagging around obstacles. Avoid the watchful Wufflegumps, whose contact will reset your progress. Reach the Color Room to see ALF change hues and perform a dance, then ascend to the start for increasingly difficult rounds. This adventure not only entertains but also helps children develop prediction, routing, and cause-and-effect understanding.

name: Action Force: International Heroes
description: Wild Bill flies his Dragonfly to save the world from Cobra in this UK-based G.I. Joe game.

name: Blood Brothers 2
description: Revisit the dark fantasy world of Arnashia with Blood Brothers 2.

name: Miner 2049er II
description: The Apple II received another set of Miner 2049er levels in the form of this release, which is often referred to as simply "Miner II."

name: Clarence: Thirty Days & Seven Seas
description: A board/card game based on the Cartoon Network show Clarence.

name: Pachio-kun 3: Pachi-Slot & Pachinko
description: Pachio-kun's third and final PC Engine CD outing has him tackling the world of Pachi-Slot as well as pachinko

name: Pachio-kun: Warau Uchuu
description: Pachio-kun's second endeavor on the PC Engine CD

name: Pachio-kun: Maboroshi no Densetsu
description: The first Pachio-kun game for PC Engine CD

name: Kaettekita Pachio-kun Dream Collection
description: Pachio-kun's second outing on the PlayStation.

name: Pachio-kun: Pachinko Land Adventures
description: Pachio-kun continues his adventures on PlayStation.

name: GB Pachio-kun 2
description: Coconuts' pachinko ball mascot has a second adventure on the Game Boy.

name: GB Pachio-kun 3
description: The final entry in the GB Pachio-kun subseries.

name: Pachio-kun: Puzzle Castle
description: Coconuts and Marionette bring you this Pachio-kun game for the Game Boy.

name: Dotcom (.com)
description: The action takes place in the year 95, when the Internet companies began their development. You will also have to join this movement and your company and your site. You will have to keep your company afloat and become one of the successful start-ups.

name: The Last Stand: Dead Zone
description:
The Last Stand: Dead Zone brings RPG, Action and Strategy to the zombie apocalypse. 
 
Load out your team and run real-time missions to gather weapons, gear, construction materials and supplies in locations across the Dead Zone all while holding off the horde. With 30,000+ items available there's plenty of ways to dispatch the walking dead. 
 
 
BUILD YOUR COMPOUND 
Build and defend your compound to protect you from the infected and human raiders. Set up barricades and traps to hold the hordes at bay. Your survival depends on it. 
 
ASSEMBLE YOUR SURVIVORS 
Attract new survivors, decide their role then equip them to help you survive. Select from a number of classes including Fighters, Engineers, Medics, Scavengers and Recon. Each role is important and will affect your chances of survival. 
 
LOOT AND CRAFTING! 
Loot or craft over 30,000 weapon and gear items in real time missions across the city. Gather schematics for weapons and gear through scavenging or trade. 
 
ALLIANCES AND RAIDING 
Raid other players for precious resources or help them with construction. Join an alliance and secure your position in the Dead Zone!

name: Puzzle & Dragons: Super Mario Bros. Edition
description: In Puzzle & Dragons Super Mario Bros. Edition, you get to travel to different worlds as you assemble a team of Mushroom Kingdom baddies, like Goombas or Koopa Troopas, and recruit much-loved Mario characters, including Toad and Yoshi!

name: Game no Kanzume Vol. 2
description: This Sega CD compilation contains some of the Phantasy Star II text adventures, which were previously released over Sega's MegaNet service.

name: Pachio-kun FX: Maboroshi no Shima Daikessen
description: Pachio-kun FX is a pachinko game with fantasy trappings.

name: GB Pachio-kun
description: Pachio-kun heads to the Game Boy for an adventure in pachinkoing.

name: Tigers on the Hunt
description:
Tigers on the Hunt is a World War 2 hard-core tactical wargame for PC. It creates a truly and immersive tactical simulation. Players can enjoy massive battles across up to 12 connected geomorphic maps with over 200 Infantry units, 100 Support Weapons, 100 Ordnance pieces and 50 Vehicles per side. 
 
Turn-based tactical wargame during World War II, developed by Siliconsoft Systems and published by Matrix Games.

name: Word Puzzles by Powgi
description: A collection of 6 word puzzle games for 3DS and Wii U. It features hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles and supports every amiibo.

name: Combined Arms: World War II
description: Turn-based tactical wargame with battalion-level command and combat.

name: Totem Topple
description: In Totem Topple you have to drop heads down on top of a totem pole while weird spiny things idly float into it as they try to knock it down.

name: The Operational Art of War IV
description: The 4th game in the Operational Art of War series

name: No. 11 Downing Street: The Adventures of Ninja Nanny & Sherrlock Sheltie
description: An interactive dictionary/encyclopedia that features a narrative centered around the adventures of an anthropomorphic cow and dog duo.

name: Gary Grigsby's War Between the States
description: Gary Grigsby's War Between the States is a turn-based grand strategy game that allows you to take the role of commander-in-chief for either side during the American Civil War.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the West
description: Based on the War in the East engine with years of additional major features and improvements, Gary Grigsby’s War in the West 1943-45 is the most ambitious and detailed computer wargame on the Western Front of World War II ever made. Starting with the Summer 1943 invasions of Sicily and Italy and proceeding through the invasions of France and the drive into Germany, War in the West brings you all the Allied campaigns in Western Europe and the capability to re-fight the Western Front according to your plan.

name: Gary Grigsby's Eagle Day to Bombing the Reich
description: Gary Grigsby’s Eagle Day to Bombing of the Reich is a detailed simulation of the Allied strategic bombing campaign against Germany in World War II. Combining both classic titles Battle of Britain and Twelve O'clock High into a single game package, this in depth air war simulation includes all the appeal of the original two titles with a huge list of extra features and improvements.

name: American Civil War: The Blue and the Gray
description: American Civil War: The Blue and the Gray is a historical strategy game set during the American Civil War.

name: Spyjinx
description: Spyjinx mixes action strategy gameplay, dynamic world building and RPG character development in a treacherous world of espionage.

name: Alice Dreams Tournament
description: Alice Dreams Tournament is a competitive party action game for Dreamcast.

name: Super Albatross
description: A golf game for the PC Engine CD-ROM that features a single-player mode with a story involving cyborgs and other unusual golf opponents.

name: Artist Tool
description: An art program for the PC Engine. Compatible with three peripherals: a drawing tablet, a scanner and a printer.

name: Horse Life 4
description:
Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various activities to show off what a dream team you are!

Create your own character and choose a loyal companion from 12 different breeds of horse. You can customise their look with a variety of new outfits and accessories. Clean, feed and care for your steed by playing a variety of fun mini-games. Unlock special content using Play Coins that youve earned and interact with your horse in real world surroundings in Augmented Reality mode.

With Local Play, you can saddle up and compete against up to three friends.

name: Horse Life Adventures
description: Horse Life Adventures is the third game in the Horse Life series.

name: A Princess to Save Me
description: A failed Kickstarter project that was to be a tactical RPG where players take on the role of a damsel-in-distress princess who has just been saved by a prince, but he gets killed on the way home.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Rei
description: A remaster of the Higurashi fandisc that includes two side stories and other extras.

name: Magic Miguel
description: Magic Miguel is an action platformer inspired by NES classics.

name: Strawberry Cubes
description: Strawberry Cubes is a very bizarre platformer with a minimal palette.

name: Nitro Nation
description: Race, mod, and tune dozens of real licensed cars. Start a team, invite your friends, win tournaments. Trade parts with other drag racers online and build your dream car.

name: Critter Catch
description: Grab a pig and hug a monkey! Catch them all before time runs out.

name: Ice Age Avalanche
description: Sin descripción

name: EndlessMobstar
description: Is a mobile mafia game by Dvalken.

name: Popt!
description: A mobile balloon popping game created by SpritzoGames. Released Oct. 20, 2015

name: Solar Crusaders
description: A multiplayer 4x game being distributed through Steam Greelight.

name: Shooty Skies
description: Shooty Skies is an endless arcade flyer from the creators of Crossy Road.

name: BeatNiks
description: BeatNiks is a pet simulator from Harmonix that features customizable monsters whose evolution is influenced by music in the users' library.

name: Zombie Defense Squad 2
description: The follow-up to the original Zombie Defense Squad.

name: Zombie Defense Squad
description: Zombie Defense Squad is a first-person shooter in which the player has to defend a small town from zombie waves. To win a round, a certain amount of zombies have to eradicated from the map. Each killed zombie is rewarded with experience points (which leads to level-ups and automatically assigned bonuses like faster reloads or higher walking speed) and money. The latter is used between rounds to buy better weapons and ammo in the store. Each round adds zombies to the wave.

name: Issho ni Photo Pikmin
description: An AR photo app for Nintendo 3DS which allows Pikmin to interact with Pikmin themed AR cards. Only released in Japan.

name: Where in North Dakota is Carmen Sandiego?
description: "Where in North Dakota Is Carmen Sandiego? is a 1989 entry in the Carmen Sandiego series. It was intended for educational purposes in the state of North Dakota.

name: Zems Online Card Game
description: A collectible card game that takes place on a game board.

name: NFL Pro 2014
description: The 2014 version of Gamelofts NFL Pro series.

name: Ripple Runner
description: Ripple Runner is a chiptune rhythm game created and scored by "DDRKirby(ISQ)" for the Ludum Dare competition. The deluxe "post compo" version adds an additional three levels, and can be played for free online.

name: Pulsar II
description: A single screen shoot'em up written by Nasir Gebelli and published by Sirius Software for the Apple II computers. The player controls a flying saucer, that can rotate clockwise or anticlockwise around a pulsar, with the aim to destroy the shields around the pulsar and finally the pulsar itself.

name: Fortune Wheel Slots
description: Sin descripción

name: World Supremacy
description: A strategy game of world conquest.

name: ATF: Armored Task Force
description: A modern military tactical combat simulator by ProSIM and Shrapnel Games.

name: Voxel Interceptor
description: Drive your space interceptor, dive into the deep space, fight against the enemy! Remember, protect the carrier! Protect the carrier! Protect the carrier!

name: Secrets of Arcadia
description: Secrets of Arcadia is a 1-2 player retro-style dungeon crawler. Develop your character through various combinations of combat skills that help you fight your way to the center of the world... where you must save a child that is being used to power a corrupt Utopian civilization.

name: Raccoon Hero: Monkey Business
description: Your goal in this game is to help the raccoon cubs escape their ball cages by matching their color with the color of the ball you throw at it. The babies are hidden among hundreds of other colorful balls. So basically, you need to destroy as much balls as necessary and achieve the certain score that is calculated for every level.

name: Dr. Cares: Pet Rescue 911
description: Take care of adorable pets and animals, and become a real vet!

name: Story of the Survivor: Prisoner
description: Story of the Survivor is an action RPG that takes place during a zombie apocalypse. The world is dead and now there is no one to stop you from escaping the Prison.... or is it? Follow the story of Steve and his prison mates as they try to make their way to freedom. But as always remember zombies aren't the only thing you should watch out for.

name: Matryoshka Strike
description:
Matryoshka Strike is a stylish and colorful shoot-em-up game with the classic characters of Russian fairy tales.
Koshchey the Deathless, Baba-Yaga, Dragon Gorynych and others.
And of course, Matryoshka.

name: Sapphire Yours
description: Collecting the gems in the mine will only sound easy until you try it! Solve the puzzles with the help of the game's unique mechanics, and fight your way towards the exit. Design levels using the included editor and share them with the community!

name: Tales of Blood and Sand
description: Tales of Blood and Sand is an RPG set in the time of Roman Republic. Join Cassius and his brothers in their struggle to achieve glory and freedom. Enter the arena and see if you can survive to tell the tale.

name: Fight'N Rage
description: Fight’N Rage is a brand new old-school side-scroller beat’em up. Inspired by the classics from the “golden age”, and with an art style that mimics the aesthetic from the 90's arcade gems, this game pays homage to all classic gameplay features that makes this genre one of the best from its time!

name: Acorns Above: A World Gone Nuts
description: You are a chipmunk pilot. Defend the universe! Take the fight to the enemy squirrels in the skies, space, and under the sea in this top down arcade shooter!

name: Adam Waste
description: This is an episodic third-person post apocalyptic sci-fi thriller

name: Cruentis the Murderer Vol.1
description: A story of murder, demons and lost souls. The eternal struggle between good and evil. Based on an original story you'll test the fear in the shoes of a teenager trapped in a temporal limbo, between present and past. You interpret the main characters of the story and try to return to the reality of your life. Escape from demons, solve puzzles, live the past of lost souls inhabiting these rooms and try not to become one of them.

name: SuperWurfels
description: Ever feel like just challenging up to 3 of your friends to one or more matches of some action packed reflex game playable on one keyboard? Then SuperWurfels is the game you are looking for! Destroy dice after dice and create massive combos to defeat your competitors.

name: Access
description: A world wide competition between hackers. Fast paced competitive puzzling. Keep your grid clear by using your deleters to destroy blocks. Crash your opponent's system by throwing blocks to them in the 2 player battle mode or take on the world, and the leader board, in marathon mode!

name: Wings of Peace VR: DayBreak
description: "Wings of Peace VR: DayBreak" is a combination of space positioning defensive shooting game, players start the game before the deployment of team players position, the rational use of terrain to share enemy firepower. If your guns head shot, and immediately incarnate the Savior of the matrix, the thrill simply won't stop! Rich store content, gameplay and more!

name: Jam Studio VR
description: Jam Studio VR is an interactive music performance application that allows anyone, at any age, to create and perform music or be a DJ, regardless of musical experience or ability. It also provides a broad range of Fun, Learning & Therapy benefits for families and individuals with special needs.

name: Eddy Violet
description: "Eddy Violet" is an Dreampunk and Postcyberpunk-based ACT game developed in the span of two years. I finished all the sections of game design by myself including 30 pieces of original music~

name: Hell Dimension VR
description: Hell Dimension VR is an arcade-style horror FPS game. You must escape from the city devastated by mysterious monsters! Use points obtained from the game to purchase diverse and different weapons! Two-handed weapons are especially entertaining with their stylish and exciting gameplay that can’t be found in any other FPS games. Through real-time multi-play, you can enjoy the game with other players. Play with your friends and try to beat their high scores!

name: Living the Deal
description: Make deals, get rich, or die trying in this unique blend of business management and life-sim. Buy, upgrade and trade businesses for a profit while attempting to maintain relationships and your own wellbeing in the process.

name: Battle Group Commander: Episode One
description: A tactical combat simulator featuring modern warfare.

name: All American: The 82nd Airborne in Normandy
description: A tactical combat simulator featuring the US 82nd Airborne in World War II.

name: Approaching Infinity
description: A sci-fi turn-based, tile-based Traditional Rogue-Like of incredible scope, accessible to new players, challenging to experienced rogue-likers. Explore an infinite procedural open-world universe full of unique environments as you lead your ship and crew to victory or death. Okay, mostly death.

name: L.A. Noire: The VR Case Files
description: L.A. Noire: The VR Case Files for HTC Vive delivers seven of the original engrossing, self-contained cases from L.A. Noire rebuilt specifically for virtual reality, blending breathtaking action with true detective work to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience.

name: The Star and the Crescent
description: A tactical combat simulator featuring modern warfare battles in the Middle East.

name: Air Assault Task Force
description: Tactical combat simulator.

name: Nioh: Bloodshed's End
description:
Nioh: Bloodshed's End is the third and final DLC expansion for the action role-playing game Nioh, developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo. Released in September 2017, this DLC concludes the storyline of the game. Key features include:

- New story content: Continuing from the events of the previous DLC, Defiant Honor, Bloodshed's End brings the climactic conclusion to the siege of Osaka and the saga of protagonist William.
- Additional missions: Introduces new main missions, sub-missions, and Twilight missions, offering challenging content for players.
- New enemies and bosses: Adds a variety of new yokai and formidable bosses to battle.
- New gear and equipment: Expands the game with new weapons, armor, and items to collect and utilize.
- The Abyss Mode: A challenging new mode where players can test their skills in an endless dungeon with increasingly difficult enemies.

name: Is the Order a Rabbit?? Wonderful party!
description: Game based on the Is the Order a Rabbit? manga/anime.

name: Super Blackout
description: An indie puzzle game.

name: Prince of Persia: Time Run
description: Prince of Persia: Time Run was an endless runner game on mobile, soft launched in Australia and New Zealand region on app store first. A few months later it was very briefly released worldwide before it disappeared. The game is no longer available.

name: Ping Pong Power

name: The Wastes
description: The Wastes is an open world multiplayer FPS taking place in a post apocalyptic world.

name: You Are Not Immune to Lava
description: You Are Not Immune To Lava is the first game created by developer Nanoco1000. It is an intensely difficult, minimalist, 2D platformer with a difficulty much akin to games like Super Meat Boy or VVVVVV.

name: Legend of the Cryptids

Move your heavily armed units around a classic styled grid-based map and engage pirates, rebels, monsters, imperial soldiers, and anyone else that stands in your way.

name: Super Adventure Pals II
description: The sequel to Super Adventures Pals sees the Adventure Pals rescuing the human's father from the nefarious Mr. B.

name: 1on1 Soccer
description: A one on one soccer game.

name: Puzzle Depot
description: Puzzle Depot is a retro-inspired puzzle-based adventure game, featuring fun characters, vast environments, and a robust level editor. Journey through a post-apocalyptic world, solving puzzles with a staggering number of mechanics and object interactions.

name: 1on1 Basketball
description: A one on one basketball game.

name: 10 Seconds or Less
description: Find the target in the image in 10 seconds or less.

name: First South Beer Pong
description: A game of virtual beer pong.

name: Days of Discord
description: Days of Discord is a digital collectible card game.

name: Seafight
description:
Seafight: an absolute highlight among MMORPGs

Come on board yer ship, pirate, and be swept away by the beautiful horizon and sea. But don't be fooled by this MMORPG's idyllic scenery - a cutthroat life awaits ye in Seafight, the MMORPG with all the pirate trimmings: plundering, conquering and murdering. Defeat vicious and dangerous scoundrels in this pirate game. And stay on guard: Danger lurks everywhere. There be giant sea monsters swimming in the treacherous waters of this online pirate game. Experience and tactical skill will keep ye on course, but only if ye know how to interpret the signs properly in this MMORPG.

Yer ship is yer sanctuary, yer empire, yer fortress. Turn it into a stronghold and defend it with all yer might. After all, what's a pirate without his ship in this MMORPG? A nobody, a good-for-nothing! If ye want to be respected, stock up yer ship and teach yer enemies the true meaning of fear!
Only the most cunning pirates will conquer the Seven Seas of the pirate game Seafight. MMORPGs like this are few and far between, and Seafight is the undisputed leader of the pack. Hoist the Jolly Roger and fight against thousands of real pirates for fame, wealth and freedom: Rule the oceans in Seafight, the online pirate game.

name: GetRektBambi
description: Sin descripción

description: Allkpop Allstar is a finger-based rhythm game.

description: A retro styled run and gun shooter.

name: That Dam Level
description: A game based on the dam infamous dam level in the first NES TMNT game.

name: Medarot 9 Kabuto/Kuwagata
description: The ninth numbered installment of the Medabots/Medarot series

name: Fly Wars
description: A action game published by Sirius Software for the Apple II computers in which the player, in the form of a spider, has to catch and eat flies by spinning web around them.

name: Heroes Reborn: Enigma
description: A prequel to the NBC television mini-series Heroes Reborn.

name: Gamma Goblins
description: A shoot'em up taking place in the circulatory system of a human body where the player has to destroy the infectious gamma goblins. Written by Tony and Benny Ngo and published by Sirius Software for the Apple II computers.

name: Tinkle Pit
description: As amusing to play as it is to say, Tinkle Pit is a maze arcade game featuring characters from multiple Namco franchises.

name: Twilight Syndrome Special
description: A compilation of the first two Twilight Syndrome games for the PlayStation.

name: Itro: In the Right Order
description: Tap icons in the order they originally appeared with each round adding a new one to the mix.

name: Ramone: Teh Gaem
description: Ramone is a platformer meme-game based off of the Rayman series. Ramone must collect enough dank memes so that he can visit the Meme Temple to become an Independant Walrus.

name: Perpetual Blast
description: Perpetual Blast for the Wii U

name: Slayin
description: An action RPG game for Android and iOS devices in which players choose a character from one of three heroes: knight, wizard and knave. After which they fight through continuous waves of monsters and bosses, leveling up and equipping new weapons all along the way. But once you die, you’re gone for good!

To survive the punishment of the penitentiary system, you’ll need to stay healthy and fit, gain allies, eliminate enemies, bribe the guards, bet in illegal boxing matches, and more while pushing for parole or planning an escape. 
 
Dear prisoners, this is Warden speaking. Welcome to the Prison, where you are SENTENCED to play! Can you survive the harsh prison life? Can you escape before your execution?

name: ZeroRanger
description:
ZeroRanger is a vertically scrolling 2D shoot'em up with heavy emphasis on shooting, dodging and... mystery?

A menacing alien threat, GREEN ORANGE, has begun its invasion. Only two secondary fighters remain against complete annihilation.

Blast your way through enemy forces in order to unleash your fighter's latent potential, unlocking new weapons and abilities.

But as you grow stronger, so does your understanding of the true nature of your adversary...

name: Haru Kiss
description: Shuuji’s grades have taken a hit since he played around too much, so his cousin Tsubame decides to take him in to keep an eye on him. But since she’s usually busy with work, he ends up taking care of the house along with younger cousin Aoi. He wishes to become independent soon. At this time, he helped his classmate Itsuki and became pretend lovers with her. Then his younger sister Konomi came to see him, along with the daughter of his judo teacher and his childhood friend, Amane. What kind of a future awaits him?

Elvenar is a free-to-play browser-based game, where you will build a flourishing city and discover a magical world full of mysteries. 
 
Build up the most beautiful city and establish the most efficient economic system that you can! In Elvenar you can upgrade almost every building, improving the productivity and the look of your city. 
 
Explore the vast World Map to acquire the knowledge of your wise ancestors and discover new technologies. Trade or fight over powerful Relics to boost your production. 
 
You can either become a skilled and well-known trader, refine your producing art or lead your troops to victory in 3D-animated battles, the decision is up to you.

name: Sorcery Jokers
description:
Inner yearnings...
Immutable ideals...
Dreams and reality...

One day, all of a sudden, magic came into the world. The existence of magic wasn't a secret known only to a certain few, but was announced by the current government and quickly became common knowledge.

Today, it's an age where magic is used as a resource and has permeated throughout many different fields. A city was founded on Agartha, the island where magic was discovered, and research continues to this day. This is a story about the fates of those who live in this magical world.

Watch as six radically different people find their paths converging...

Mutsumi Haruto, a 9th-Class Caster at the First National Magical Academy. A slightly half-baked boy who can't turn a blind eye to wrongdoing.
Senri, an OutCast. An anonymous inhabitant of the city's nightlife.
Rikudou Asahi, a 9th-class Caster at the Academy. A unique girl facing trials on her way to the Land of Dreams.
Atori Riku, a 10th-Class Caster at the Academy. A CEO's daughter who's not on the same wavelength as her peers.
Kousaki Fiona Annabel, an apprentice sister at the local church. Her smile never goes out.
Noah, the Unknown. A girl spotted on Agartha.

Casters and OutCasts... What fate awaits these two divergent forces?

The miracle of magic which governs the world will shape the fates of those within it.

name: Heist Night
description:
Heist Night is an asymmetrical multiplayer stealth action game in which one player will play as a thief trying to steal valuables in a museum and escape unscathed. The other player controls the (two) guards in order to capture the thief before escaping with the museum’s precious objects.
Heist Night offers two vastly different types of gameplay that interplay with each other. It offers first person stealth action gameplay for the thief, and real-time strategy gameplay for the guards.

name: Sheep Dreams Are Made of This
description:
Sheep Dreams Are Made of This is a looping platformer focused on telling a deep mature story themed around recurring nightmares and traumas of the past.

In Sheep Dreams Are Made of This you control a man stuck inside the same nightmare for 17 years, where he takes the form of a sheep that can do nothing but run, jump and collect fragments of his long forgotten memories.

name: The Miskatonic
description: Explore the writhing depths of Miskatonic University as new faculty member, Charlotte LeStrange and meet the otherwordly yet charmingly hilarious residents of this place while investigating the innate strangeness and oddities of this mysterious university.

name: Super Zugan 2: Tsukanpo Fighter
description: A Super Famicom mahjong game based on the manga Super Zugan. The criminally unlucky Hideyoshi Toyotomi continues to lose at mahjong.

name: Beat Sports
description:
These aren’t your typical sports nor your typical opponents. The away team is from far, far away: a musical galaxy full of aliens obsessed with one thing…Sports!

These adorable creatures are your teammates and opponents, challenging you in a variety of music-infused whacky mini-games based on familiar sports like tennis, volleyball, and golf. Let your ears and eyes guide you into the groove and show them how it’s done!

Designed by Harmonix Music System, Inc., the makers of Rock Band™, and developed exclusively for the new Apple TV, Beat Sports is controlled using the brand new Siri Remote. To get the whole family playing, download the free Beat Sports Remote app from the App Store and use your iPhone or iPod Touch as a controller, allowing for up to 4 players total.

Original soundtrack features songs composed by Harmonix and by Masaya Matsuura, the creator of PaRappa the Rapper.

name: Dungeon Boss
description: Dungeon Boss is a free-to-play, dungeon raiding action game for mobile devices.

name: Alpha Shield

description: Unlight is Asia-Pacific’s No.1 grossing Facebook game. It is a card combat game.

name: Pikmin 4
description:
Meet Pikmin, small, plantlike creatures you can grow, pluck, command, and overpower your enemies with! These curious helpers come in different types—fire is no sweat for Red Pikmin and the brand-new Ice Pikmin can freeze enemies and the environment. Use your Pikmin’s miniature might (and a bit of strategy) to explore this mysterious planet.

You get a dog, too! Oatchi, resident good boy and dependable partner, can help with things like smashing obstacles and carrying Pikmin throughout your adventure. With the miniscule Pikmin and a capable canine in tow, no challenge is too big!

name: Boss 101 with S.T.E.V.E. and Max
description: Boss 101 is a shoot-em-up with a large focus on bosses. Players can fight randomly generated bosses or even build their own.

name: Dexter: Hidden Darkness
description: A hidden object game based on the Showtime television series.

name: Spectre
description: A Pac-Man variant in which the player moves this time through a split screen 2D/3D-maze collecting dots and avoiding the deadly Questers. Written by Bob Flanagan and Scott Miller and published by Datamost for the Apple II computers.

name: The Legend of The Artifact
description: The Legend of The Artifact is a platformer with fighting game elements.

name: L.A. Noire for the Nintendo Switch
description:
A dark and violent crime thriller set against the backdrop of 1940's Los Angeles. 
 
Amid the post-war boom of Hollywood's Golden Age, Cole Phelps, an LAPD detective is thrown headfirst into a city drowning in its own success. Corruption is rampant, the drug trade is exploding, and murder rates are at an all-time high. In his fight to climb the ranks and do what's right, Phelps must unravel the truth behind a string of arson attacks, racketeering conspiracies and brutal murders, battling the L.A. underworld and even members of his own department to uncover a secret that could shake the city to its rotten core. 
 
Utilizing revolutionary facial animation technology that captures every nuance of an actor's facial performance in astonishing detail, L.A. Noire blends the breathtaking action with true detective work for an unprecedented interactive experience. Solve brutal crimes, plots and conspiracies inspired by real crimes from 1947 Los Angeles, one of the most corrupt and violent times in L.A. history. Search for clues, chase down suspects and interrogate witnesses as you struggle to find the truth in a city where everyone has something to hide. 
 
Includes the complete original game and all additional downloadable content plus new collectibles and detective suits to unlock, each with unique special abilities. 
 
Features an array of new enhancements specifically for Switch gaming including a Joy-Con mode with gyroscopic, gesture-based controls, HD rumble and new wide and over-the-shoulder camera angles, plus contextual touch screen controls for portable detective work.

name: L.A. Noire
description: L.A. Noire for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One delivers the complete original game and all additional downloadable content with a range of technical enhancements for greater visual fidelity and authenticity, including enhanced lighting and clouds, new cinematic camera angles, high resolution textures and more. L.A. Noire plays natively in 1080p for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One consoles, and stunning 4K for PlayStation 4 Pro and Xbox One X, capturing the grit and grime of the City of Angels like never before.

name: Dead Frontier
description: Dead Frontier is a free-to-play, browser-based MMO game which takes place in a post-apocalyptic, zombie-infested setting. Players can explore a huge world alone or with friends, and wield over 100 weapons to be used on zombies or players in PvP mode.

name: Symphony of Eternity
description:
A fantasy RPG full of monsters, legendary weapons and drama!

A high quality fantasy RPG full of monsters, legendary weapons and dramas!

This story mainly includes two factor: One is the quest for a legendary weapon "Regratlute" which makes its bearer's desires come true.
The hero Kreist is the cool guy who're willing to get the weapon and take the happy golden years, rescuing his concerned people with the power of Regratlute. His friend Dauturu is the hot-hearted ancient golem who agrees Kreist's dream.
Another factor is the coup d'etat of Eashtend kingdom. Honesty and kind king, queen, ladies and gentlemen in the royal family are totally killed by the traitor, lady Safario with the dark desire to conquer whole the world.
This two storyline becomes into one stream when Laishutia who says she is the escaped princess of Eashtend royal family encounters Kreist and Dauturu. To get back the Eashtend from traiter's clutch, they decide to be a party to seek Regratlute and defeat the traitors.

name: Lichtspeer: Double Speer Edition
description: LICHTSPEER is an action arcade lightspear-throwing simulator based in an Ancient Germanic Future. Exclusive Nintendo Switch co-op mode for 2 players included!

name: Doom Warrior
description:
Slaughter your way through an array of vicious opponents while gaining riches, power and glory. Crush your enemies, watch them beg for death and hear the cries of their women! 
 
 
Create the ultimate warrior 
Take your barbarian gladiator from the humble beginnings of the arena to verge of god-hood. In Doom Warrior there is literally no limit to how powerful you can become and with so many stats and abilities to choose from the number of viable character builds are endless. 
 
Forge your destiny, and your gear! 
Doom Warrior takes character customization to a whole new level. All pieces of equipment can be reforged into a design of your choosing. Create a masterpiece from hundreds of individual parts, which can be combined in several million different ways. 
 
	 
Live or die 
In Doom Warrior you hold the power of life or death. Do you execute your defeated opponent and risk incurring the wrath of his allies? Or do you show mercy in the hope of breaking the cycle of violence? Which-ever path you choose, the consequences will be serious and far reaching. 
 
An epic journey 
Embark on a journey spanning the breadth of the globe. From the rotting desert slum of Ras Khalat, to the frozen Blackfells and the sweltering jungles of Raktul; take part in an epic tale of power, corruption and lust. Will you fight to protect the weak, or see the rivers run red with the blood of the innocent?

name: Scuffle Buddies

name: Taphouse VR

name: Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup
description:
Starring Blitzcrank and friends from League of Legends, Blitzcrank’s Poro Roundup is a free side-scrolling 8-bit-inspired arcade adventure.

From Riot Games, creator of League of Legends (and Teemo... sigh), comes Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup, a free side-scrolling mini-game, out for a limited time!

Blitzcrank must save his fluffy poro friends from Baron Nashor's belly. Why? Well, because robots have hearts too... or maybe their programming is just telling them that they do. This is getting confusing.

name: The Card Stars: Cribbage / Solitaire

It, along with the related Magus in Mystic Geometries, are rare examples of ZUN's contributing to fan-made works.

name: Random Heroes

name: Gotcha Racing

description: Fish as a Redneck with dynamite.

description: A text-only stock market simulation game in which the players takes the role of the fictive character Beryl Flinch whos task is to get elected chairman of the board of MegaCorp - a conglomerate of ten subsidiaries.

name: Tina's Toy Factory
description: Tina's Toy Factory is a classic match 3 puzzle game with the addition of local multiplayer. You break open crates by matching 3 in a row which releases toy parts. You then combine the toy parts to make complete toys.

name: MasterCube
description: Players attempt to survive as long as they can in this shmup by WarlockArts.

name: Crazy Mazey
description: A action game written by Ron Meadows and published by Datamost for the Apple II. The player's goal is to capture all the cash in the maze without being caught by enemy cars.

name: Anthill
description:
Anthill is a gorgeous strategy game with an award-winning interface based on the real-world behavior of ants. By drawing pheromone trails, you direct your ground forces to different destinations, working with streams of units rather than individuals.

Similar to a tower defense game, your mission is to protect the hill as wave upon wave of enemy bugs are thrown at you.

name: Sea Legends: Phantasmal Light
description: A hidden object game from Shaman Games.

name: Cloud Critters
description: An endless arcade game from Shedworks Interactive.

name: Apothecarium: The Renaissance of Evil
description:
A hidden object game set in France.

During the Middle Ages a terrifying, mysterious disease raged across Italy. It killed thousands of people, whole towns and villages perished together. There were legends of a mythical town of Apothecarium, where the secret to defeating the disease was hidden.

name: Dreamscapes: Nightmare's Heir
description: The second game in the Dreamscapes hidden object series.

name: Tenkomori Shooting
description: A minigame-centric arcade release from Namco, which focuses on many aspects of the vertically-scrolling shoot-em-up genre.

name: Little Party
description: Little Party is a video game where the player controls a mother stuck at their daughter's birthday party.

name: Hisshou! Pachi-Slot Fan
description: A pachi-slot simulation game for the Super Famicom.

name: Kikan Bakumatsu Ibun Last Cavalier
description:
During the Bunkyuu Era, the Tokugawa shogunate that had remained in power for three centuries was being pressured by both foreign countries to open its borders and feudal lords who aspired to restore Imperial rule, and was on the verge of collapse due to internal and external scheming.

The political strife shifted from Edo to Kyoto, with heroes and conspirators alike attracted to the Imperial capital. At that time, a new squad called Shinsengumi was formed on the orders of the Military Commissioner Matsudaira Katamori to maintain peace and order. Only women known as "shouki", who can harness power of mystical stones known as "kishouseki", were eligible to become its members.

Okita Soujirou was working as an instructor at the Shieikan dojo in western Edo. Without any relatives, he considered the dojo master Kondou Isa and her sworn sister Hijikata Sei, who both saved his life when he was young, to be his family. When women of the dojo were called to help in forming the Shinsengumi, they asked Soujirou to disguise himself as a woman and join them. Now known as Okita Soushi, Soujirou held only one goal in him mind - to protect Isa and Sei, even if he couldn't hold the same power as a real "shouki".

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Atsumete - Tomodachi Daisakusen!
description:
Taiko no Tatsujin: Atsumete - Tomodachi Daisakusen! is the third Taiko videogame for the Wii U home console, and the second console game to be released in occasion of the 15th Anniversary of the Taiko no Tatsujin franchise; as such, the Game + Tatacon bundle of this title also includes a set of promotional goods related to the anniversary celebrations.

This installment inherits the signature multiplayer modes from the previous Wii U games (Baton Pass from Wii U Version and Intro Don! from Tokumori), with the addition of the new 'Buddy Attack' single-player mode, in which Taiko sibling Kat-Chan tries to become a popular star by befriending wild animals from the streets with music. Content unlocking through the Mekadon Gacha and DLC supports make their return, as well as the coming of Nintendo-exclusive features to the game like Miiverse support and, for the first time ever, compatibility with Nintendo's Amiibo figurines.

name: Lep's World
description: A 2D platformer for mobile devices.

name: Ravenwood Horror
description:
Ravenwood Horror is a horror themed puzzle game set in a 19th century mansion.
Made by Ted Latas in 2008 via RPG Maker VX.

name: Star Bridge
description: Fly forever in this endless Zaxxon-style space shooter from Firebase.

name: Dude World
description:
Dude World is a 2D sandbox game about creating a world and share it with the entire community.

You can use the editor to create whatever you can imagine or download a world created by another player and play it with your friends.

name: B.U.G.S.
description: B.U.G.S. is a space shooter with many similarities to Galaga.

name: The You Testament
description: The You Testament is a 2008 PC game made by British indie game developer Matt Dickie. Players take the role of a disciple of Jesus Christ and help play out the most crucial moments of the Greatest Story Ever Told.

name: Diamon Jones: Amulet of the World
description: Explore the ancient world of Egypt in this mystical Adventure game! Help Diamon Jones become the rich and famous hero he wants to be, as you explore the Pharaohs` temples and find amazing treasures. Travel all over the world on your incredible journey to first find the Amulet of the World, and then replace it, when the natural order of the world has been upended. Can you help Diamon Jones save the world?

name: Best Fiends
description: A match three game developed by Seriously Digital Entertainment.

name: Adventure Time: Rockstars of Ooo
description: A rhythm game starring Adventure Time characters.

name: Formula Cartoon All Stars
description: A kart racing game starring Cartoon Network characters.

name: Red Pixel
description: Red Pixel is a 2D deathmatch platformer, released as open source in 2001.

name: F22 Air Dominance Fighter: Red Sea Operations
description: An expansion pack for F22 Air Dominance Fighter.

name: RoboMaze: The Basement
description: RoboMaze is a top down shooter by Wetware, in which you play as a freedom fighter, fighting against an oppressive robot regime.

name: Fortune Cookie
description: Platform Game

name: Tetraspace
description:
Brane is a mobile/web/pc puzzle game set in a four dimensional world. The player can switch one of the usual dimensions with the fourth dimension to navigate a 4D puzzle. 
 
It was inspired by the beautiful, long-awaited Miegakure by Marc ten Bosch, and can in fact be thought as a free alternative or at least an homage to this game.

name: WolfKnights
description: A new MMORPG developed by IMC Game.

name: Elite Starfighter
description: Elite Starfighter is an Elite clone by Pepper Games in which the player get to experience a universe with 2000 star systems, with the options to engage in piracy, trading, bounty hunting and exploration. The game was only released in Germany.

name: Evergreen
description: Nurture a tree throughout the history of Earth in Evergreen.

name: Cloud Grove
description: Cloud Grove is a nature-based puzzle game from Bromoco Games.

name: Medivia Online
description:
Medivia Online is a massive multiplayer online roleplaying game first released in 2009. It's a simple 2D game with an oblique projection which gives an illusion of depth. However, despite the fact that Medivia Online is a 2D game it has a third dimension as well creating an effect of different floors in a 2D world.

Players on Medivia Online are currently allowed to choose one of four professions they will play during the journey in a mystery medieval world full of beauty and magic.

name: Check In, Knock Out
description: When the hotel double books rooms, the only answer is to have an all-out battle with the other potential guests to secure a reservation.

name: Walt Disney's Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
description: Help Snow White avoid the evil clutches of the jealous Queen and seek refuge in the Dwarfs' forest home. Beware of strangers peddling apples and find Prince Charming, your true love, to live happily ever after.

name: Disney Learning: Phonics Quest
description: Disney Learning: Phonics Quest challenges kids to enhance and master their phonics skills while taking a magical journey with Mickey and his friends. Using state-of-the-art voice recognition technology, kids will actually be able to speak their answers out loud as they master a variety of phonics-based, multilevel learning activities.

name: Machina of the Planet Tree: Flying Dreamer
description: The sequel to Machina of the Planet Tree developed by Denneko Yuugi, a Japanese doujin group.

name: Disney Learning: 2nd Grade
description: Disney Learning: 2nd Grade is an educational game for children aged six to eight based on the US 2nd grade curriculum. The game has Buzz Lightyear from the Toy Story franchise as the host and the game is set in Andy's room while he, along with Woody, is off at school. In his room different mini-games can be selected.

name: Barbie's Team Gymnastics
description: In Barbie Team Gymnastics the player helps Barbie, Chrissie, Teresa develop and perfect their routines on for different pieces of apparatus, the vault, the beam, the uneven bars and the floor. The girls practice until they are good enough to compete in various contests and hopefully qualify for the Nationals.

name: Rule the Waves
description: Real-time, pausable combat with a 4x grand strategy overlay in the golden age of Dreadnoughts. By Naval Warfare Simulations for PC

name: MEG 9: Lost Echoes
description: Within the hostile environment of the Probability Aperture, a high-tech research complex called Horizon vanishes from the grid. Take control of the Rig, a massive 10-ton remote-operated vehicle outfitted with the latest in military hardware, to get Horizon back online.

name: Dragon Oath
description: Dragon Oath, also known as Tian Long Ba Bu in China, is a free-to-play MMORPG developed and published by Changyou.com and Sohu and launched in May 2007. The game's story is based on the novel Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils by Louis Cha.

name: Yo-kai Watch Dance: Just Dance Special Edition
description: A collaboration between Level-5 and Ubisoft, the game is a Yo-kai Watch-themed version of the Just Dance games.

name: Dead Synchronicity: The Longest Night
description: A small text based prequel to Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today.

name: Arthur's Reading Games
description: An educational game featuring Arthur Read.

name: Psycho Pigs
description: This sequel to Butasan brings the pig murdering action to the 3DS eShop.

name: Mads, Morfar og Miljøstrup
description: A classic Danish DOS game released in 1994, which was installed on most school computers and was intended to learn kids about the environment.

name: QuadraDigger
description: QuadraDigger is a free browser-based rotating block puzzle game inspired by the original Game Boy handheld console.

name: Tap Sports Football
description: A free-to-play mobile football game from Glu.

name: Portal Walker
description: Portal Walker is an MMORPG inspired by classic 16-bit games for mobile phones, tablets, and PCs.

name: Super Mahjong 3: Karakuchi
description: A mahjong game for the Super Famicom and the third in the Super Mahjong series from I'Max.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Shadows of the Servants
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Half of Darkness: Beyond the Spirit's Eye
description: Sin descripción

name: Angelique Retour
description:
Angelique Retour is the remake of Angelique. It was one of the surprise announcements during the Neoromance 20th Anniversary stage event, the other being Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6. It is the first Angelique game to be on the PS Vita. Hachi-roku-hachi-ko is the character designer for this game.

Keiko Erikawa said in two Famitsu interviews that she has always wanted to revisit the IP. She continues to be proud of it, believing that its success helped pave a new market for female audiences. Erikawa wanted this particular title to be made in gratitude to the fans who have followed the Neoromance brand since its beginnings and to reintroduce the IP to younger audiences.

The Treasure Box edition includes an illustration book, a book containing published versions of the event illustrations, an original soundtrack CD, a bromide art card set of ten romanceable characters, and fastener charms of the romanceable characters. The 20th Anniversary edition has the Treasure Box edition merchandise and the following extras: a Hachi-roku-hachi-ko illustrated tarot card set, a Kairi Yura comic called Angelique ~Secret Sacrea~, two Kairi Yura illustrations, and a drama CD with messages from the romanceable characters. The Gamecity Set can be appended to any purchase of the game; it includes a character illustration book different from the boxed editions and an Angelique themed corsage clip. Purchase the game from Gamecity Shopping to receive an original short story pamphlet. Reserve the title at various store outlets to receive different merchandise.

name: Zettai Meikyuu Himitsu no Oyayubi-hime
description: Zettai Meikyuu: Himitsu no Oyayubi Hime is an otome game, developed and published by Karin Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2015.

name: Natsumegu
description: Sin descripción

name: Squares
description: Squares is a puzzle reflex game. The objective is to turn grey all the blue squares, while dealing with different kinds of squares before the time goes up. The game features 91 levels as well as a level editor for creating your own challenges.

name: World of Sea Battle
description: World of Sea Battle is an action-packed MMO game in which players can take control of a ship and immerse themselves in the age of sail. With a huge open world and more than fifty ships of the XVI-XIX centuries, from small schooners to giant ships of the line, with various PvE and PvP game modes, as well as massive guild battles for control over the many ports of the archipelago.

name: Skylanders: Lost Islands
description: After the war with Kaos, the Skylanders must explore and build new villages on the recently discovered Lost Islands for the peaceful Mabu

name: Legacy of the Times
description: Post-apocalyptic cyberpunk real-time strategy game.

name: Boggle
description: So you think you’re fast at finding words? Prove it! Challenge yourself or up to 3 friends online in a refreshed, updated Boggle experience. There’s still the same Boggle you like. You can also play with a suite of different variants and house rules to really shake things up! Search fast and act faster… it’s an all-new way to play Boggle!

name: The Cottage
description: The Cottage (originally released under the Swedish name Stugan) is a Swedish humorous text adventure in the vein of Zork. It was originally released on mainframes in 1978, followed by a home computer release by SPCS in 1986.

name: County Fair
description: A shooting gallery game similar to Sega's Carnival written by Dan Illowsky and published by Datamost for Apple II.

name: Wild Wheels

name: Pictureka! Museum Mayhem
description: A hidden object game based on the Pictureka! board game.

name: Chousoku Henkei Gyrozetter: Albatross no Tsubasa
description: Sin descripción

name: Full Bokko Heroes X
description: Full Bokko heroes X is a role playing game and shooter crossover for the IOS/ android.

name: Alternity
description: A shoot'em up in which the player controls a orb along the edges of geometrical shapes and shoots up moving objects.

name: Paradise Lost: First Contact
description: Paradise Lost is a 2D pixel art side scrolling adventure that focuses on a stealth-action type of play and takes elements from platformer and puzzle resolution.

name: Floatmotion
description: Float through space without hitting cubes, collect different items and enjoy over 10 random generated levels.

name: F1 Chequered Flag
description: An arcade-style F1 racing game.

name: GameGuru
description: A 3D game making suite.

name: Hell Marys
description: Hell Marys is an Android card battle MMO. Battle through an apocalyptic universe by collecting and evolving gruesome monsters.

name: Knights & Dragons
description: Knights & Dragons is an RPG for Android and iOS that allows you to craft and evolve armor. The game centers around weekly bosses, PvP tournaments, and guild battles.

name: Dragon Eternity
description: Dragon Eternity is a cross-platform MMORPG where players create a character and explore a fantasy world with magic and dragons.

name: X-Mercs
description: Players defend the planet from an alien invasion by commanding a team of skilled mercenaries armed with futuristic weapons.

name: Cloud Raiders
description: Cloud Raiders is an action strategy game where players take the control over, and maintain, a stronghold island.

name: Chipper & Sons Lumber Co.
description:
Welcome to Beaver Forest, where little Tyke is about to venture out into the world for the first time! You'll plant trees, chomp trees, and build a wide variety of things using the lumber that you gather!

Find trees and cut them down to collect the wood. Take the wood to Mr. Chipper (your Dad) and he will make lumber for you. Using that, as well as the items you collect, you'll build things ranging from Lumberbots, to Totem Poles, to Crab Cabanas, and in the process you'll unlock new and more advanced blueprints!

There are also plenty of mini-games offered by the inhabitants of the forest, each rewarding you with unique and helpful items, such as fungal fertilizer and storm callers, which can summon a rain storm at the press of a button to help your trees grow!

name: Dandy: Or a Brief Glimpse Into the Life of the Candy Alchemist
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Remix 16
description: Ninja Remix 16 is a remake of the original The Last Ninja for 16-bit computers.

name: The Old Man Club
description: An adaptation of Ernest Hemingway's 'The Old Man and the Sea' where arm wrestling might not be the true test of one's mettle.

name: Devil's Third Online
description: A free-to-start version of the multiplayer component found in the Wii U-exclusive Devil's Third by Valhalla Game Studios released for PC.

name: Sweet Clown: Gozen San-ji no Okashi na Doukeshi
description: Sin descripción

name: Moero!! Nettou Yakyuu '88
description: The Moero!! series' solitary entry on the MSX.

name: Gossipia
description: Gossipia is a trivia game based on social interests.

name: Maison Kanraku: The Second Climax
description: A "panty-throwing simulator"

name: Hanata-Kadaka!?
description: After a malicious tanuki kidnaps a fox's girlfriend, he prays at a shrine for a savior. Enter: the tengu.

name: Moero 7!! Judo Warriors
description: A cartoony judo simulator for Famicom.

name: IC Carddass DragonBall
description: IC Cardass DragonBall is a PC and mobile card game based on the Dragon Ball animated series. It uses Near Field Communication in special real world cards in order to add cards to a player's virtual deck.

name: Ninja Tag
description: Ninja Tag is a 4-player, local multiplayer deathmatch game with stealth elements.

name: Doukyuusei
description:
Doukyuusei is a 1992 erotic dating sim (the first of its kind) where the player can meet 14 girls to have a romantic relationship with.
The player takes the role of a high-school student (default name Takurou) in a Japanese town; his parents have just moved into a large mansion in a good district. The boy has to go to the new school, but his mind is preoccupied with one subject only: pretty girls. Instead of studying hard, Takurou decides to explore the city and to find out more about its female inhabitants.

name: Photos with Animal Crossing
description: See your Animal Crossing friends come to life right before your eyes!

name: From Light
description: A 2D puzzle platformer that uses light mechanics similar to photography exposure.

name: Baseball Mogul 2013
description: The 2013 entry in this series of PC only career baseball management simulation.

name: Project Spaghetti
description: Project Spaghetti is a Western 2D shooter influenced by games from the Commodore 64 era. Players fire bullets that ricochet off of objects and bounce around the edge of the screen, gaining speed until they either hit an enemy, the player, or explode.

name: Pixels Defense
description: Pixels Defense is a mobile game based on the 2015 film, Pixels, in which aliens attempt to invade Earth in the guise of popular 1980s video games.

name: Rabbit Jump
description: A 2D action game that involves a rabbit jumping off of a fox in order to get carrots.

name: Dinner Bell
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Jenni Polodna.

name: First Things First
description:
You've just arrived at home from your nightly visit to the science and invention section of the local public library, where you spend each night dreaming your dreamy dreams of one day inventing a time travel machine. Tonight, for some reason, you're especially fatigued, and can't wait to get inside and go right to bed. Seems like a good plan, but somehow you have a premonition it's not going to be that easy...

A piece of interactive fiction written by J. Robinson Wheeler.

name: Child's Play
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Stephen Granade.

name: Rematch
description:
Like Aisle, this is a game that only lasts one move; you're expected to repeat that move many, many times. Unlike Aisle, though, this is a puzzle game--there's a problem you're trying to solve in that one move. It's a pretty complex problem, moreover, and the parser is accordingly expanded--in some syntaxes, up to five nouns, well beyond the norm. Not only is the puzzle difficult, but there are some red herrings that make the puzzle even harder--but it's also very satisfying when you finally do solve it. Both funny and grim--lots of amusing stuff around the edges, but the puzzle itself isn't particularly funny. A few nudges are included in the game, but no explicit spoilers.

Interactive Fiction written by Andrew D. Pontious.

name: Moments Out of Time
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by L. Ross Raszewski.

name: Ollie Ollie Oxen Free
description:
"War may sometimes be a necessary evil. But no matter how necessary, it is always an evil, never a good. We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other's children." - Jimmy Carter

A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Carolyn VanEseltine.

name: Baseball Mogul 2014
description: The 2014 entry in this series of PC only career baseball management simulation.

name: Six
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Wade Clarke.

name: Robin & Orchid
description:
High school journalists spend the night in a church, investigating reports of a ghost.

A piece of interactive fiction written by Ryan Veeder and Emily Boegheim.

name: Exhibition
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Ian Finley.

name: You Will Select a Decision
description: A pair of knock-off Choose Your Own Adventure books from Soviet-era Kyrgyzstan, newly declassified by the CIA.

name: Pytho's Mask
description:
On the Night of the Comet, the usual astrological bonds do not hold, and the order of the universe is threatened. It is a time made for rebels and usurpers, and all who would claim the kingdom for themselves.

You are a member of the Order of the Phoenix, a protector of the hierarchy and the kingdom itself. It is your duty to attend the royal ball, watch for dangers... and do whatever needs to be done.

A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Emily Short.

name: Alabaster
description: Alabaster is an experiment in open authorship: a piece of interactive fiction with conversation text contributed by a number of different authors in response to an introduction written by the project's organizer, Emily Short.

name: Not Just An Ordinary Ballerina
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Jim Aikin.

name: To Hell in a Hamper
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by J. J. Guest.

name: Nightfall
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Eric Eve.

name: Christminster
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Gareth Rees.

name: The Axolotl Project
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Samantha Vick.

name: Flexible Survival
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Nuku Valente.
